name: Material Theme UI
description:
Material Theme UI Plugin

Material Design Experience for JetBrains IDEs

IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT THE NEW SUBSCRIPTION MODEL!!!

Since version 6.0.0 the plugin is now a freemium plugin.

That means that the plugin is completely free to use, but some functionalities and extra features are only available for subscribed users. There is also a free trial to test out those features before subscribing.

Moreover, the plugin benefits from a fallback license, which means that buying an annual license grants you the rights to use the plugin indefinitely.

Sorry about this sudden change, I hope this won't scare you from using the plugin. Besides, we have many free tiers available.

More information in the Material Theme UI Documentation.

Material Theme UI is a plugin for JetBrains IDE (IntelliJ IDEA, WebStorm, Android Studio and so on) that changes the original appearance to a Material Design look and feel.


Originally inspired by the Material Theme for Sublime Text, this plugin offers a panoply of settings to tweak up the IDEs the way you want. Aside for its impressive palette of themes, it also offers:

  • Beautiful color schemes supporting a vast majority of languages
  • Replacement of all icons with colorful Material Design icons
  • Customization of most of the IDE's controls and components
  • A lot of options, such as accent colors, padded menus, custom indent, arrow styles and such
  • Some useful tweaks, such as Project View Decorators, Language Additions, etc...

And it gets updated pretty frequently!


Take a look at the beautiful website for more information and for questions and answers
